ILO Presentation: Enabling the 'Composable Enterprise'™

Peter Temes - Founder and President of the Institute for Innovation in Large Organizations (ILO) - was kind enough to invite me to speak on enabling the ‘Composable Enterprise‘™ at a recent meeting of the institute’s members in New York. A PDF of the presentation can found

here. Peter has put together a stellar program with an ‘A list’ corporate membership. The discussions at these events are always fascinating and informative. The discussion that followed last week’s presentation got into some very interesting topics such as ethics of automation, an important topic indeed.

Written on April 2, 2015
